title: Rep. Van Hollen: Alan Gross' Release A 'Miraculous' Moment
teaser: Melissa Block talks to Democratic Congressman Chris Van Hollen of Maryland about the release of Alan Gross. Van Hollen is one of the lawmakers who flew to Cuba to bring Gross back to the U.S.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
